before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"4v11i","text":"-Clean all the area with DNA away.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6lvle","text":"-Heat the Incubator to 55°C for lysis.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5bnme","text":"-Heat buffer PL1 at 50°C for at least 30min before to start the extraction to dissolve SDS precipitant.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5hkdv","text":"-Equilibrate buffer PE to 65°C.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dj7rn","text":"-Proteinase K : add 2500 µl Proteinase K buffer PB to adjust concentration to 20 mg/mL, incubate 1min at RT. Don't vortex! Do aliquots of 250µL. Store at -20°C. Don’t freeze/defreeze aliquots more than 3 times.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":1,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7gd3u","text":"-Thaw/prepare Lysozyme (20mg/ml) in TE-Buffer.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":8},{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2004l","text":"-Wash Buffer PW2: add 100ml EtOH 96-100%","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":1,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2iuu4","text":"This DNA extraction protocol allows to get both eukaryotic and prokaryotic DNA from microalgae strains, so the microbiome diversity can be studied in cultures by using this protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ac5d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6pv26","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Ecology of Marine Plankton (ECOMAP) team - Roscoff

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"7cn2v","text":"You can perform this protocol in safety conditions on the bench.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
manuscript_citation: Camara dos Reis M., Romac S. et al. Microbiome assembly in axenic Emiliania huxleyi cultures is influenced by the source community composition and is resilient to disturbance. In prep.
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"5gp6r","text":"-NucleoSpin PlantII (Macherey-Nagel - ref 740770.50 (50 preps);","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"38vb1","text":"-Proteinase K 100 mg (Macherey-Nagel - ref 740506) ;","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ns95","text":"-Optionnal : Lysozyme (Sigma - ref L6876-1G).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3i11i","text":"-TE 1x buffer sterile (Dominique Dutscher – ref 348619).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bva8a","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1cvr","text":"-Centrifuge 5427R (Eppendorf, ref 5409000210).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3q4o9","text":"   -Thermomix - magnetic stirrer (Eppendorf – ref 5382000015) equipped with thermoblock 1.5-2mL (Eppendorf - ref       3880000151)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ahmg0","text":"Transfer 2mL from the strain in a sterile 2mL microtube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1fi3","text":"Centrifuge 5 min at 5000g to pellet the strain.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bp69r","text":"Discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d3ifg","text":"Pellet are ready for extraction or can stored at -20°C until extraction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8k2u2","text":"Add 400µL PL1 + 25µL proteinase K 20 mg/mL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":10,"length":3},{"style":"bold","offset":21,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"vcht","text":"Vortex.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8m045","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1urf","text":"If you don't need to extract prokaryotic DNA, skip step 3 et directly go to step 4.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"62fl4","text":"Optionnal : ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5kstn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"abh54","text":"If you also want to extract the prokaryotic DNA to study microbiome associated to the eukaryote strain, add 100µl Lysozyme 20mg/mL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":114,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eajd7","text":"Vortex and incubate for 5 min at room-temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6o0nm","text":"After lysis, short spin the lysate and transfer the lysate on a NucleoSpin Filter column (purple column).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ki2e","text":"Centrifuge 5min @ 11 000g.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a9p62","text":"Transfer the eluate on a new sterile 2mL microtube. If a pellet is visible, only transfer the supernatant without touching the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a7l2k","text":"Add 550 µL PC buffer, mix by pipetting up and down at least 5 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":11,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a8g67","text":"Transfer all liquid onto a green column (max 650µL).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fr67h","text":"Centrifuge 1min @ 11 000g. Discard the flow-through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8vine","text":"Repeat this step until all liquid has been loaded on the green column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ee6o","text":"Add 400µL PW1 to the membrane of the column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":10,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eknqv","text":"Centrifuge 1min @ 11 000g. Discard the flow-through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e45tb","text":"Add 700µL PW2 to the membrane of the column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":10,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5tcbc","text":"Centrifuge 1min @ 11 000g. Discard the flow-through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"978lp","text":"Add 200µL PW2 to the membrane of the column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":10,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4r004","text":"Centrifuge 2min @ 11 000g. Discard the flow-through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4hnsp","text":"Put the column on a new sterile 1.5mL microtube correctly labeled (name, date, operator).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5knfl","text":"Add 50µL PE (preheated 65°C) onto the membrane. Incubate 5 min @ 65°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7cuj9","text":"Centrifuge 1min @ 11 000g.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Total DNA extraction from microalgae strain samples using NucleoSpin Plant modified kit (Macherey Nagel)
title_html: Total DNA extraction from microalgae strain samples using NucleoSpin Plant modified kit (Macherey Nagel)

versions.title: Total DNA extraction from microalgae strain samples using NucleoSpin Plant modified kit (Macherey Nagel)
versions.title_html: Total DNA extraction from microalgae strain samples using NucleoSpin Plant modified kit (Macherey Nagel)

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"88hf1","text":"- Wear a labcoat and nitrile gloves during all the process.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9rcqb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
